-1.title: EMS in Crisis/Geriatric Medicine/Brown vs. Board
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Viewpoint with Lea Thompson is a one-hour magazine style documentary TV program focusing on matters of pressing concern to older Americans. Lea Thompson is the host of the show and Alexis Abramson, Ph.D., RLTV's "Lifestyle Gerontologist" serves as one of our field correspondents for these powerful pieces. Other stories shine a spotlight on people, organizations and policies representing what America is doing for seniors and what seniors are doing for themselves.
imdb.title: Viewpoint
plot: _Viewpoint_ (qv) with Lea Thompson is a one-hour magazine style documentary TV program focusing on matters of pressing concern to older Americans. Lea Thompson is the host of the show and Alexis Abramson, Ph.D., RLTV's "Lifestyle Gerontologist" serves as one of our field correspondents for these powerful pieces. Other stories shine a spotlight on people, organizations and policies representing what America is doing for seniors and what seniors are doing for themselves.::RLTV [us]
